name: part_006
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】宝鐘マリン1stライブ「Ahoy!! キミたちみんなパイレーツ♡」【DAY2】 [hmS_z-2epcM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Introductory sequence featuring concert titles and visual effects of the sea and pirate treasures.
Houshou Marine appears on stage and performs 'Seishun Archive'.
MC section where Marine greets the audience and the stream viewers.
Houshou Marine continues the performance of 'Seishun Archive'.

subtitles.original: Houshou Marine 1st Live "Ahoy!! You're All Pirates♡"
subtitles.english: Houshou Marine 1st Live "Ahoy!! You're All Pirates♡"

subtitles.original: 宝鐘マリン1stライブ「Ahoy!! キミたちみんなパイレーツ♡」
subtitles.english: Houshou Marine 1st Live "Ahoy!! You're All Pirates♡"

subtitles.original: 世界が壊れてゆく
subtitles.english: The world is breaking down

subtitles.original: 泣き声が聞こえていた
subtitles.english: I could hear crying voices

subtitles.original: 汚れた拳　痛むほど
subtitles.english: Dirty fists, until they hurt

subtitles.original: 強く握った
subtitles.english: I gripped them tight

subtitles.original: 当たり前に笑っていた昨日はどこにもない
subtitles.english: The yesterday when we laughed as if it were natural is nowhere to be found

subtitles.original: 明日がどんな日になるのか誰も知らない
subtitles.english: No one knows what kind of day tomorrow will be

subtitles.original: 正義にさえ捨てられた今日を
subtitles.english: Today, even abandoned by justice

subtitles.original: 取り戻すこと誓う
subtitles.english: I vow to take it back

subtitles.original: 振り上げろ　勇気の旗掲げて
subtitles.english: Raise it up, hoist the flag of courage

subtitles.original: 旅立とう　嵐の海
subtitles.english: Let's set sail into the stormy sea

subtitles.original: 立ち上がれ　幸せは願えば
subtitles.english: Rise up, if you wish for happiness

subtitles.original: 手に入るほど安くはない
subtitles.english: It's not cheap enough to just be handed to you

subtitles.original: 守るために戦うなら海賊と
subtitles.english: If you fight to protect, then a pirate

subtitles.original: なればいい
subtitles.english: you should become

subtitles.original: キミたち！船長のライブ来てくれてありがとう！
subtitles.english: Everyone! Thank you for coming to Senchou's live!

subtitles.original: アリーナ！配信のみんな！
subtitles.english: Arena! Everyone watching the stream!

subtitles.original: 全速前進！いきますよ！
subtitles.english: Full speed ahead! Here we go!

subtitles.original: 幸せ簡単に手の中
subtitles.english: Happiness easily in hand

subtitles.original: 消えてしまう
subtitles.english: disappears

subtitles.original: 悲劇をただ見てることが
subtitles.english: Just watching the tragedy

subtitles.original: 許せないなら
subtitles.english: if you can't forgive

subtitles.original: 独り震えていた弱い自分消えはしない
subtitles.english: The weak self that was trembling alone won't disappear

subtitles.original: それでも決意胸に抱けばもう惑わない
subtitles.english: But if I hold determination in my heart, I won't waver anymore

subtitles.original: 道半ばで倒れた友に
subtitles.english: To the friend who fell halfway

subtitles.original: 託された言葉抱き
subtitles.english: Clutching the words entrusted to me

subtitles.original: 振り上げろ...
subtitles.english: Raise it up...
